death.attack.lunge.item: %1$s couldn't outrun the blade of %2$s using %3$s
death.attack.riposte.item: %1$s couldn't handle the swordplay of %2$s using %3$s
enchantment.dualswords.daisho.desc: Increases the damage bonus from dual wielding.
enchantment.dualswords.deflect.desc: Increases return speed of parried projectiles.
enchantment.dualswords.forceful.desc: Increases knockback dealt from a lunge.
enchantment.dualswords.lunge.desc: Enables the ability to thrust forwards with a weapon.
enchantment.dualswords.parry.desc: Enables the ability to parry and riposte attacks.
enchantment.dualswords.thrusting.desc: Increases damage dealt from a lunge.
